text: Libjulia in master and release-1.6 is broken on macOS for me. AFAICT since the split into libjulia and libjulia-intern (reexported symbols in libjulia are missing leading underscores). See <https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia/issues/38925|https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia/issues/38925> -- IMHO a release blocker?
